Name: Outrace
About the game: The 80s called. They want their vibe back. Inspired by early arcade racers, Outrace brings the pseudo-3D genre back to life with a vibrant colour palette and synthwave soundtrack. Explore a world of branching racetracks, balmy beachside highways and neon sunsets. Play arcade mode to relive the classic Outrun excitement of racing against the clock, or turn off the timer and enjoy a retro drive at your own pace. Unlock the fastest vehicles and most exotic track locations by performing well on the racetrack. Earn achievements for completing stages and setting record times. Compete against the best Outrunners with top scores posted on global leaderboards. Enjoy an authentic pseudo-3D racing game which brings the 80s arcade atmosphere to your fingertips. Choose from a range of color filters to fine-tune your retro experience, including a truly old-school CRT effect. Outrace is more than a game. It's a whole atmosphere. So what are you waiting for? Racers, start your engines!
